metadata.title: CVE-2023-6735 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Privilege escalation in mk_tsm agent plugin in Checkmk before 2.2.0p18,2.1.0p38 and 2.0.0p39 allows local user to escalate privileges

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
